sections.heading: of Educational Lands and Funds; records of state lands; duty to keep
sections.text: The records appertaining to all public lands of the state shall be kept in the office of the Board of Educational Lands and Funds at the seat of government.SourceLaws 1877, ยง 4, p. 173;R.S.1913, ยง 5559;C.S.1922, ยง 4863;C.S.1929, ยง
